sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: background_image
sub_fields.instructions: Sets the background image for the entire section and all layouts within it. This setting will override any background color.

sub_fields.label: Section Padding (Top)
sub_fields.name: section_padding_top
sub_fields.instructions: Controls the amount of empty space before the first layout starts.

sub_fields.label: Section Padding (Bottom)
sub_fields.name: section_padding_bottom
sub_fields.instructions: Controls the amount of empty space after the last layout ends.

sub_fields.label: Layout Padding
sub_fields.name: layout_padding
sub_fields.instructions: Controls the white-space between layouts in this section, does nothing if only one layout is in this section.

sub_fields.label: Jump Link
sub_fields.name: jump_link
sub_fields.instructions: Appends an anchor link to the section for smooth scrolling to the section.
